title: 12/22/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
itunes:title: 12/22/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that the Dallas Cowboys' offensive scheme is too simple and defenses have figured them out. Chris says defenses have caught on to what the Dallas offense is doing.
